    • Method Detail

      • getServiceEndPoint

        public static java.lang.String getServiceEndPoint(@NonNull
                                                  ScantoKit.ServiceType type)
        get the default service endpoint by service type
        Parameters:
        type - service type
        Returns:
        a url in string as the base of the service

      • init

        public static void init(@NonNull
                        android.content.Context context,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String app_id,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String app_secret,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String service_endpoint)
        initialize the image match service. Only parameters from the first call take effect.
        Parameters:
        context - the android context, we will use the application context to access the cache directory for temporary files.
        app_id - the application id. This is unique to each application. pls get this id from the service provider.
        app_secret - the application secret. This is unique to each application. pls get this id from the service provider.
        service_endpoint - the service base url. This will be provided by the service provider

      • isImageNotFoundError

        public static boolean isImageNotFoundError(java.lang.Throwable t)
        check if the Throwable object from Subscription to the returned Observable object represents match failed error. This error is normal in operation and should be handled accordingly.
        Parameters:
        t - The throwable object
        Returns:
        true if the error is due to matched image is not found. false otherwise

      • matchImage

        public static rx.Observable<ScantoKit.MatchResult> matchImage(@NonNull
                                                           android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Do a image Match by provide a image in memory.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - a android bitmap
        Returns:
        returns a rx.Observable object which will do the service call and pass the result to client. null if the service is not initialized or there are problems with the passed image file
        See Also:
        rx.Observable

      • matchImage

        public static rx.Observable<ScantoKit.MatchResult> matchImage(@NonNull
                                                           android.net.Uri uri)
        Do a image Match by provide a image file.
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri represent a image file used to match
        Returns:
        returns a rx.Observable object which will do the service call and pass the result to client. null if the service is not initialized or there are problems with the passed image file
        See Also:
        rx.Observable

      • startScanner

        public static void startScanner(android.app.Activity activity)
        Start the builtin image match ui. the ui is a new activity. when it is finished, it will return back to the activity passed over.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that we will return to when the image match ui finish.
